questions.question:
Who is the main protagonist of Part 1: Phantom Blood?
A. Jotaro Kujo
B. Josuke Higashikata
C. Jonathan Joestar
D. Giorno Giovanna

What is the name of Dio Brando's Stand in Part 3: Stardust Crusaders?
A. The World
B. Star Platinum
C. Killer Queen
D. Gold Experience

A. Jean Pierre Polnareff
B. Jotaro Kujo
C. Joseph Joestar
D. Noriaki Kakyoin
